name: goMaker
description: A development tool that aids in various aspects of building TrueBlocks by automatically generating help files, API interface specs, command line options parsers and test case files

scripts.build: mkdir -p bin && go build -o bin/goMaker main.go
scripts.deploy: yarn build && cp bin/goMaker /usr/local/bin/ && echo '✅ Installed to /usr/local/bin/goMaker' && which goMaker && echo '✅ Installation verified'

author: TrueBlocks
